newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle active at $72 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle active at $72 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was moderately active in the Panhandle area Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were steady. Feedlots reporting firm inquiry.
Sales reported on 17,400 slaughter steers and 10,300 heifers; 27,700 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 9,700 formulated cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 72.00, pen early 71.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-3 1300 lbs 69.00. Small pen Select and Choice 1-3 1200 lb Holsteins 65.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs
Confirmed - 27,700 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 700
Wk to Date - 37,400 Week Ago - 20,700 Year Ago - 15,800
